nodes.text: Golorno was the young Human sensor officer aboard Mon Remonda during General Han Solo's hunt for Warlord Zsinj. He died when he was sucked into the vacuum of space after Nuro Tualin's brainwashed assault on Mon Remonda.
Chris Trevas revealed at Celebration VI that the depiction of Golorno in his illustration for The Essential Reader's Companion was based on himself.
